feed.title: yzzfo | Share for Free - particle system
feed.subtitle: 游戏开发学习资源分享

entry.title: RPG VFX Bundle
entry.content:
Huge amount of high quality effects for RPG and top-down games!

The asset includes:

  • Different complex effects (Magic arrows, shields, buff and debuff spells, hits, magic circles, projectiles, attack spells, lasers, track markers and more)
  • A large number of unique textures
  • Multipurpose custom shaders
  • Scripts, one of which allows you to change the color of the effects, so you can change the color in 1 click.

Supports built-in render by default. HDRP and URP are supported using this FREE package for Unity 2021 or below. It becomes free after purchasing one of my assets.

URP/HDRP is default from Unity 2022 or Unity 6+. Shader Graph is required which is installed together with this asset. Can be changed to built-in render. All effects work on all platforms. They can be easily re-sized and re-colored.


Promo media (videos, images) uses post process "Bloom" from the Volume component.

Contact me if you have any problems or questions. Contact methods on the profile page.

entry.title: RPG VFX Bundle
entry.content:
Huge amount of high quality effects for RPG and top-down games!
该资源包括：
- 不同的复杂特效（魔法箭、盾牌、强化和弱化咒语、击中、魔法圈、喷射、攻击咒语、激光、轨道标记等）
- 大量独特的纹理
- 多用途自定义着色器
- 脚本，其中之一允许您更改特效的颜色，因此您只需单击一下即可更改颜色。

支持 HDRP 和 URP (LWRP)。
此处是 HDRP 和 URP (LWRP) 的支持包！
支持 PC/游戏主机/移动设备/VR。
所有效果都经过了优化并且适用于所有平台。可以轻松调整大小和颜色。

由于此资源包包含许多独特的特效，因此它包括：

AAA 魔法圈和盾牌
AAA 风格化喷射第 1 波
AOE 魔法咒语第 1 波
3D 激光资源包
地图轨道标记 VFX
+ 更多特效

促销媒体（视频、图像等）采用“泛光”后期特效！

如果您有任何疑问或问题，欢迎咨询我。

entry.title: Lightning VFX (BiRP)
entry.content:
⚡️ UNLEASH THE THUNDER w/ Lightning VFX! ⚡️

⚡️ Light up your game with dazzling bolts of lightning! 🎮✨


An epic lightning VFX prefab made of advanced particle system configurations, a HAND-DRAWN lightning texture with custom shaders + components for automatic variation, dissolve, and post-processing effects.


👉 Realtime/Live WebGL Demo


Did we mention our effect features REAL animated lights that cast shadows and illuminate the environment? Brighten the night! 🌩️


⚡️ Charge up your scenes and make your players feel the power! 💪😎


Using specially-made Cinemachine components for camera shake impulses as well as a new post-processing blending system, the closer you are to the effect, the greater the visual force-feedback.


⚡️ Let your creativity run wild! 🎨🌈


We use Unity's native particle system to setup nearly every aspect of the effect, meaning you can customize practically everything. Our shaders have neatly exposed properties for even more control, and you can tweak the quality of the radial blur.


You don't have to take our word for it...


👉 TRY THE DEMO!


On mobile/low-end hardware?

📲 Simply enable the on-screen PERFORMANCE MODE. 🚀🌕

entry.title: Lightning VFX (BiRP)
entry.content:
⚡️ 释放雷电，带来闪电特效！ ⚡️

⚡️ 用耀眼的闪电为你的游戏增添光彩！ 🎮✨

一个史诗般的闪电特效预制件，由先进的粒子系统配置构成，配有手绘闪电纹理和自定义着色器 + 组件，用于自动变化、溶解和后期处理效果。

👉 实时/在线 WebGL 演示

我们提到过我们的效果具有真实的动态光源，能够投射阴影并照亮环境吗？ 点亮夜空！ 🌩️

⚡️ 为你的场景充电，让你的玩家感受到力量！ 💪😎

使用专门制作的Cinemachine组件来实现相机震动冲击，以及新的后期处理混合系统，你离效果越近，视觉反馈的力量就越强。

⚡️ 让你的创造力尽情发挥！ 🎨🌈

我们使用Unity的原生粒子系统来设置效果的几乎每个方面，这意味着你可以几乎自定义所有内容。我们的着色器具有整齐暴露的属性，以便于更大的控制，你可以调整径向模糊的质量。

你不必只听我们的说法……

👉 试试演示！

在移动设备/低端硬件上？

📲 只需启用屏幕上的性能模式。 🚀🌕

entry.title: Sword slashes PRO
entry.content:
The pack contains 22 unique slash effects + 11 combo skills. These are not trails for the sword. These are separate effects!


⚡ All effects perfectly work on all platforms and use optimized custom shaders.

You can easily resize slashes using standard size values. The length of the slash varies in the material.


☄️ Demo for PC


You can update my old asset to this only for $6


PC/Consoles/Mobiles/Web/VR supported.

Supports built-in render by default. HDRP and URP are supported using this FREE package for Unity 2021 or below. It becomes free after purchasing one of my assets.

URP/HDRP is default from Unity 2022 or Unity 6+. Shader Graph is required which is installed together with this asset. Can be changed to built-in render.


IMPORTANT! A character with animation is not included to the asset!

Promo media (videos, images) uses post process "Bloom" from the Volume component.

Contact me if you have any problems or questions. Contact methods on the profile page.

entry.title: Sword slashes PRO
entry.content:
该包包含22种独特的斩击特效和11种连击技能。这些不是剑的轨迹。这些是独立的特效！

⚡ 所有特效在所有平台上均能完美运行，并使用优化的自定义着色器。

您可以使用标准尺寸值轻松调整斩击的大小。斩击的长度在材质中有所不同。

☄️ PC演示

您可以以仅$6的价格将我的旧资产更新为此版本。

支持PC/主机/移动设备/Web/VR。

默认支持内置渲染。HDRP和URP通过使用这个免费的包支持Unity 2021或更低版本。在购买我的资产之一后，该包将变为免费。

URP/HDRP是Unity 2022或Unity 6+的默认设置。需要Shader Graph，该工具与此资产一起安装。可以更改为内置渲染。

重要提示！该资产不包含带动画的角色！

宣传媒体（视频、图片）使用了来自Volume组件的后期处理“辉光”。

如果您有任何问题或疑问，请与我联系。联系方式在个人资料页面上。

entry.title: Real Fire & Smoke
entry.content:
This VFX package uses high-res animated sprite sheets with the Shuriken particle system to create dynamic fire and explosion effects. It features 3 fire styles and 104 prefabs for versatile use.

Real Fire & Smoke uses high-res animated sprite sheets combined with the Shuriken particle system. Features 3 styles of fire and explosions that are conveniently sorted in 7 categories for ease of use.


WebGL Demo


Key Features


  • 3 unique fire styles
  • 104 total prefabs (21 prefabs are URP only)
  • 5 explosion sound effects
  • 3 looping fire sound effects
  • 7 sprite sheets for fire & smoke (8x8 frames, resolutions from 2048-8192 px)

Effect Categories


  • Refraction
  • Smoke
  • Sparks
  • Trails
  • Explosions
  • Fire
  • Flamethrower
  • Projectiles

entry.title: Real Fire & Smoke
entry.content:
这个VFX包使用高分辨率的动画精灵表和Shuriken粒子系统来创建动态的火焰和爆炸效果。它具有3种火焰风格和104个预制件，适用于多种用途。

真实火焰与烟雾使用高分辨率的动画精灵表，结合Shuriken粒子系统。具有3种火焰和爆炸风格，方便地分为7个类别以便于使用。

WebGL演示

主要特点

  • 3种独特的火焰风格
  • 总共104个预制件（21个预制件仅适用于URP）
  • 5种爆炸音效
  • 3种循环火焰音效
  • 7个火焰与烟雾的精灵表（8x8帧，分辨率从2048到8192像素）

效果类别

  • 折射
  • 烟雾
  • 火花
  • 轨迹
  • 爆炸
  • 火焰
  • 喷火器
  • 弹药

entry.title: Character Auras
entry.content:
15 amazing character aura effects!

The pack contains 15 amazing aura effects:

  • Water aura
  • White aura
  • Soap ayra
  • Smoke aura
  • Sleep aura
  • Shine aura
  • Meteor aura
  • Lightning aura
  • Healing aura
  • Gold aura
  • Freeze aura
  • Fire ayra
  • Darkness aura
  • Blood aura
  • Acid aura

All prefabs are game ready, just take and drop them into your game!


Supports built-in render by default. HDRP and URP are supported using this FREE package for Unity 2021 or below. It becomes free after purchasing one of my assets.

URP/HDRP is default from Unity 2022 or Unity 6+. Shader Graph is required which is installed together with this asset. Can be changed to built-in render.

All platforms supported!


These are not mesh effects! All effects are just simple looped particles system! Promo media (videos, images) uses post process "Bloom" from the Volume component.

Contact me if you have any problems or questions. Contact methods on the profile page.

entry.title: Character Auras
entry.content:
15个惊人的角色光环效果！

该包包含15个惊人的光环效果：

  • 水光环
  • 白色光环
  • 肥皂光环
  • 烟雾光环
  • 睡眠光环
  • 闪耀光环
  • 流星光环
  • 闪电光环
  • 治疗光环
  • 金色光环
  • 冰冻光环
  • 火焰光环
  • 黑暗光环
  • 血液光环
  • 酸性光环

所有预制件均为游戏准备就绪，只需将它们拖放到您的游戏中即可！

默认支持内置渲染。HDRP和URP通过这个免费的Unity 2021或更低版本的包进行支持。在购买我的资产之一后，它将变为免费。

URP/HDRP是Unity 2022或Unity 6+的默认设置。需要Shader Graph，该组件与此资产一起安装。可以更改为内置渲染。

支持所有平台！

这些不是网格效果！所有效果只是简单的循环粒子系统！宣传媒体（视频、图片）使用来自Volume组件的后期处理“辉光”。

如果您有任何问题或疑问，请与我联系。联系方式在个人资料页面上。
